name: Coalition Builder Cocktail
description: You're the natural connector who believes the best tech solutions emerge when diverse voices come together with shared power.
drink: B L A C K B E R R Y S M A S H

name: Prosperity Pour
description: You're the equity and inclusion champion who ensures everyone gets their fair share of technology's benefits.
drink: T H YM E F O R A D R I N K

name: Visionary's Elixir
description: You're the possibility pioneer who believes in technology's power to create wondrous new realities when guided by human imagination and intentional choices.
drink: B E T T E R PA LO M A
